revised_title: Advances in Battery Technology: Copper and Zinc Electrodes with Chloride of Zinc
tldr: The author discusses a new battery technology using copper and zinc electrodes with chloride of zinc, which offers lower internal resistance and improved conductivity. This battery is ideal for telegraphy, as it can be left for weeks or months without attention and renews its strength after each period of rest. The zinc oxide produced falls to the bottom of the vessel and can be separated when needed.
